cab.content: SECRET " 66(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJEST Y'S GOVERNMENT)$ C.(58) 163 COPY NO.21st July, 1958CABINETLEGISLATIVE PROGRAMME; 1958/59 session memorandum by the Minister of Housing and Local Governmentand Minister for Welsh affairs it will probably be necessary to pass before the end of the 1958/59session a very short Bill postponing, for two years, the re-valuation dueto come into force in England and Wales in 1961. This should, therefore,be added to List A. 2.2. A paper explaining why the Bill may be necessary is being circulated to the Home Affairs Committee to-day.H.B.Ministry of Housing and LocalGovernment, S. W.l.21st July, 1958.
